original: “Mohaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ tattha cittaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
analyzed: ▁moh aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁anabhi jān aṃ ▁apari jān aṃ ▁tattha ▁cittaṃ ▁avi rāj a yaṃ ▁a ppajah aṃ ▁abhabb o ▁dukkh akkhay āya

original: Mohañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ tattha cittaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
analyzed: ▁moh añca ▁kho ▁bhikkhave ▁abhi jān aṃ ▁pari jān aṃ ▁tattha ▁cittaṃ ▁vi rāj a yaṃ ▁pajah aṃ ▁bha bb o ▁dukkh akkhay āyāti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
